page.title: 18LOCAL CONCERNS, EGERTON
page.content: Residents of the village are extremely concerned over the possibilty of future housing development in the area. A survey revealed that there was 100% opposition to further housing. It is generally considered that whilst local facilities are adequate for the young and adults, there are few facilities for teenagers and young adults. Considerable concern is felt over the volume of traffic passing through the village, the high speed limit, and the lack of concern by the Highway Authority to their problems.
